      • scroll

        default <T> java.lang.Iterable<Hits<T>> scroll(Query<T> query)
        Returns an Iterable to scroll through all matches of the given query. If the query does not specify scroll keep alive, then the implementation will use the default Query.DEFAULT_SCROLL_KEEP_ALIVE value.
        Parameters:
        query -
        Returns:
